basics.name: Ra誰s Hamidou
basics.label: Admiral & Corsair Commander
basics.summary: Passionate corsair and maritime strategist with extensive experience in naval warfare and trade route protection. Skilled in leadership, navigation, and diplomacy, with a deep understanding of Mediterranean geopolitics during the Golden Age of Barbary Corsairs.

work.name: Regency of Algiers Navy
work.description: Naval defense force of the Regency of Algiers
work.summary: Supreme naval commander defending Algerian waters and Mediterranean trade routes against European naval powers.
highlights: Rose from humble origins to become the most feared corsair commander in the Mediterranean
Led numerous successful naval campaigns against Spanish, Portuguese, and Italian vessels
Commanded the defense of Algiers against multiple European naval attacks
Captured over 200 enemy vessels during his career
Fell heroically in battle against the USS Constellation during the Second Barbary War
Known for exceptional seamanship and tactical brilliance in naval warfare

work.name: Barbary Corsairs
work.description: North African privateers operating under Ottoman authority
work.summary: Independent corsair captain conducting naval operations in the Mediterranean.
highlights: Built reputation as a skilled naval commander and tactician
Secured trade routes for Algerian merchants
Earned the title 'Ra誰s' (Captain) through demonstrated naval prowess

awards.title: Title of Ra誰s (Admiral)
awards.summary: Elevated to the rank of Admiral for exceptional service and naval victories

awards.title: National Hero of Algeria
awards.summary: Honored posthumously as a symbol of resistance against colonial powers and defender of Algerian sovereignty

projects.name: Defense of Algiers
projects.description: Led multiple successful defenses of Algiers harbor against European naval forces
highlights: Repelled numerous attack attempts by European powers
Maintained Algerian control of Mediterranean shipping lanes
Protected the sovereignty of the Regency of Algiers

projects.name: Final Battle - USS Constellation
projects.description: Engaged American frigate USS Constellation during the Second Barbary War
highlights: Commanded the Algerian flagship Mashouda (46 guns) against superior American force
Fell in battle while defending his ship and crew
Battle became legendary in both Algerian and American naval history
